title: gumbo
directions: in large stock pot, saute onion, celery and red pepper in margarine or butter
turn heat to high and add file powder, hot sauce, seasoning mix and garlic and cook for 5-6 minutes stirring constantly
reduce heat to medium, stir in tomato sauce and cook another 5 minutes
add stock and bring to a boil
reduce heat and simmer about an hour
add hot sauce and seasoning mix to taste
add cooked chicken, cooked sausage and raw shrimp to pot
cover and let sit with no heat for 6 minutes
* can add shrimp shells to the stock while it is simmering before adding meat
ingredients: 2 lbs andouille sausage (or other smoked sausage)
4 tsp seasoning mix (2 tsp each cayenne, black pepper, and white pepper, 3 tsp each of garlic powder, onion powder and basil)
